title: How to report a booster
body:
Hey, so in my last game I was partnered with someone (my adc) who I thought was way too talented for our tier, so after game i check his history and unless somehow he miraculously found his calling 30 or so games ago (the past 2 days) this guys is boosting. we ended the game at 20 mins with him being 19 1 6, his account has a 48% win rate, however in the last 20 games they have won 18 of them. very suspicious, so how do i report this person now that I am out of the post game screen without breaking riots name and shame policy?
-VeganCrossfitter

replies.body: You can open a support ticket and report them there :)
